Text: Fighting Caravans:  Based on the 1929 novel "Fighting Caravans" by Zane Grey, the film is about a young frontier scout who helps guide a freight wagon train across the country, fighting off Indians and evil traders, while his two crusty companions try to save him from falling in love.
